summary: Out of jail for a crime she did not commit, Madelon turns to prostitution and thievery to send her illegitimate son to medical school.
cast: Helen Hayes|Lewis Stone|Neil Hamilton|Robert Young|Cliff Edwards|Jean Hersholt|Marie Prevost|Karen Morley|Charles Winninger|Alan Hale|Halliwell Hobbes|Lennox Pawle|Russ Powell|Reginald Barlow|Joseph E. Bernard|Ed Brady|Nora Cecil|Frankie Darro|Claire Du Brey|Sherry Hall|Tiny Jones|Robert Lees|Gus Leonard|Theodore Lorch|Eric Mayne|Buster Phelps|Frank Reicher|Virginia Sale|Larry Steers
title: El pecado de Madelon Claudet
